name: Cheeky Brownies
description: Chocolate and Greek yogurt combined in one petite package for a rich, fudgy snack, and only 70 calories each.
preparation: In a medium bowl, add butter, brown sugar, and cocoa. Microwave, on high, for 1 min to melt butter. Remove from microwave and whisk until smooth.
Whisk in yogurt, eggs, and vanilla extract.
Whisk in flour and baking powder until evenly combined.
Place the Perfect Petites on Sheet Pan. Using a basting brush, lightly brush with oil.
Divide batter evenly between petites and bake for 12–15 min to desired firmness.
When cool to the touch, flip Perfect Petites onto Sheet Pan and twist to pop out brownies.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Perfect Petites
summary: A versatile non-stick silicone pan that makes baking the cutest bite-sized portions easy and fun! Go beyond baking and use the Perfect Petites to make ice cubes, portion baby food and sauces, and more!
